Our dinner visit was arranged by our taxi driver . Kamlo restaurant is on the main Lewis Street in negombo . As guided by our driver we stuck to Sri Lankan local favourites of prawn curry , fish curry and veggie curry . We received...all these three accompanied by complimentary dhal , aubergines, and chutneys . We linked the fish curry so much that our waiter was going in and out of their kitchen getting our and other orders to hungry customers . Our dessert was their coconut ice cream that came as we were suffering the after effects of a rather spicy main course . 

Highly recommend Kaml all these three accompanied by complimentary dhal , aubergines, and chutneys . Highly recommend Kamlos.

Recommended by a driver which is the owner‚Äôs friend, we had a great rice & curry dinner. Good products, fresh fish, simply but well cooked. 
Nice place in this touristic place (where you can easily get cheated).

Always something on the special board. Really good prices and a very friendly and helpful service. The local dishes are well worth a try and there will not be a shock when the tab arrives. try it once and I am sure you will return.

Out for a walk on our first night in SL, menu looked good and it did not appear too touristy, and the staff were welcoming/friendly without being OTT. The food was superb. 3 of us had Sri Lankan Curry‚Äôs and one had the Sole cooked...in Garlic. Nothing to fault. My prawn curry was so tasty with just the right amount of spice, and the 5 vegetable side dishes that came with it were all really flavoursome and very different to what you would see at home in UK. We ate the lot and thoroughly enjoyed it. With drinks/beers the meal for 4 was ¬£20. Amazing val in Garlic. Nothing to fault. Absolutely solid and satisfying food. The grilled mullet & jumbo prawns, chilly crabs and batter-fried prawns were all done to perfection. The portions were very generous too. The turn-around time was quick and service was attentive. Keep it up Kamlo!
